Values.5_d_1: <speaker=_NPC1>Do you want to take her place? I might be tempted...</speaker>
Values.5_d_2: <speaker=_NPC1>No? Then stop pestering me with this bitch.</speaker>

Values.5_d_1: <speaker=_NPC1>No, I won't let you have your way with her. Stop asking!</speaker>

Values.5_d_0: <speaker=_NPC1>{NPC.school_kathy.nameFirst}? I keep her around for fun.</speaker>
Values.5_d_1: <speaker=_NPC1>Why are you asking? Do you want to take her place?</speaker>

Values.5_d_0: <speaker=_NPC1>{NPC.school_kathy.nameFirst}? I keep her around for fun.</speaker>
Values.5_d_1: <speaker=_NPC1>Did she tell you that I am her boyfriend? That's at least partly true. I will hurt you if you touch her. I will hurt you if you talk to her. I will hurt you if you look at her creepily.</speaker>
Values.7_d_0: <speaker=_NPC1>I think you understand where I am going with this: if you ignore her completely we will get along fine.</speaker>
